about.title: About Me
data: I am a frontend developer passionate about creating intuitive and attractive web interfaces. With experience in modern technologies like React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, I specialize in transforming designs into smooth, responsive digital experiences.

I am a Software Engineer specialized in backend and full-stack development, with proven experience in demanding corporate environments and key technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, SQL, Node.js, Angular, and agile methodologies (Scrum). I have been part of NTT DATA, where I participated in developing solutions for Enagas.

My differentiator lies in combining a solid technical foundation with an analytical mindset, consistency, and a 100% results-oriented approach. I don't just develop software: I identify problems, propose improvements, and build scalable, maintainable solutions aligned with business goals.
